hero-title: Find Your Dream House By Us
hero-subtitle: Own your own Home, one property at a time. We are committed to providing the best real estate product according to the required quality standards and on-time delivery.
about1: We are always keen on customer satisfaction by offering the best value, the highest quality, and an ideal price per square meter. We continue to excel and always be the best choice in the real estate sector, offering the best residential and investment opportunities in the Egyptian real estate market.

about-text: Sarh Real Estate Development and Investment is a pioneer in the design and implementation of modern residential, commercial, and administrative buildings. We consistently strive to provide the best finishing quality in the real estate market, adhering to the highest standards of quality and safety, in accordance with the building permit requirements. This allows us to provide upscale housing without any violations. We have successfully delivered numerous residential projects in various areas.
about-sarh: Sarh Real Estate Development Company was established in 2018 and is the owner and developer of all its projects. We always strive to select the best locations in new cities that provide an ideal residential life with the highest investment return, while taking into account providing the best price per square meter with various payment plans that suit all the needs of our valued customers.
